title: Game never loads
body:
Basically since the start of today, I cannot get into any games. When champion select ends and the game is about to load, it sends me back to the client and shows the reconnect button. When I press the reconnect button, it says "Game already in progress" for about half a second and then the reconnect button reappears and this loops on forever. There is a glitch I know of where you can't load into the game until everyone else has loaded but this was not the case as I couldn't load in for the entire game. 

EDIT: Also the same result for custom games.

replies.body: It almost sounds like your client is having a really hard time getting connected to the game servers. It could be due to some weird firewall setting that may have changed, but let's make sure to cover all our bases by checking through your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Hit me back up if those steps don't seem to help much!
Problem still persisting after a day
